title: Focus
lyrics: (Sound without Focus is just noise)
We gon' party with y'all a lil' bit (Okay)
This my tribute to the West, check
With so much knock in the LBC
It was hard not to claim that DPG
Summertime popped in the L-A-C
With the music courtesy of D-A-Z
And the Soopa Doopa Fly for the troopers
Riders, supers, hoes, groupies
All of 'em with the short tight jeans on
"Let's Play House" all of 'em theme song
Made on the gangster, squad up
Black, brown throwin' same side up
Then the West got harder
Soopafly hit 'em on the head on Tha Doggfather
Don't nobody party like the West, though
G-Funk been the sound since Death Row
Where you think we got the kicked-in clap at?
Time to bring it back, bitch, and it's like that
Only in LA (Only in LA)
Where the gangsters play (Where the gangsters play)
Catching up on things (Oh, ah)
Summertimin', let's go ride
Come up out that shithole, gotta get this money
Long Beach, CR, all this shit is sunny
Put the monkey in it like the shit is funny
Banana-clip Rasy 'bout to spit this dummy
The funkist told me to kick back
I like revenge, retaliation, and get-back, nigga
Got more bars than Kit Kats
Get smacked like Kat Stacks if you lift, jack
A motherfucker better recognize
With a flick of my wrist, like Kevorkian, you all die
All I do was ball high
Tryna stay above the rim like a tall guy
That nigga Daz super fly, they alright
Lexus, Lazzonis, left lane, tall ride
OG to BG, I thought I'd warn ya
Only in California (Yeah)
Only in LA (Only in LA, uh)
Where the gangsters play (Where the gangsters play, true shit)
Catching up on things (Oh, ah, Kendrick Lamar)
Summertimin', let's go ride (Uh)
Movin' down Rosecrans, bumpin' D-A-Z
Feeling like 1-9-9-3
91 to the 710, I'm in Long Beach
Home of Dillinger, Dillinger gangster shit
Gangsters killin' you wanksters, quit fillin' your iPods up with classics
Ain't a nigga out can match them adlibs (Woo)
DPGC general
Gin on my breath while Jennifer hold my genitals
Yeah, it's like that 'cause I was taught that
Back when Dogg Food dropped, in the Compton swap meet parking lot
Daddy V had three, sold one to my pops, we was poppin' now
The trunk in the Caddy was rockin' now
Slap a nigga in the face with them 808s
Even make Pac salute
Snares like a bear trap, they unbearable too
Bear witness
Hits like Barry Bonds, Daz the realest, nigga
Only in LA (Only in LA)
Where the gangsters play (Where the gangsters play)
Catching up on things (Oh, ah)
Summertimin', let's go ride
Only in LA (Only in LA)
Where the gangsters play (Where the gangsters play)
Catching up on things (Oh, ah)
Summertimin', let's go ride
